DOC.criteria: Mild Cognitive Impairment , amnestic subtype 65 year age old Availability knowledgeable informant Access internet 3 hour per week Adequate vision , hearing , motor respond participate training History major stroke , head injury loss consciousness > 30 minute , neurological disorder systemic illness think affect cognition ( e.g. , seizure disorder , demyelinate disorder , etc . ) Current past major psychiatric illness ( e.g. , schizophrenia , bipolar affective disorder ) History substance abuse Current use antipsychotic anticonvulsant medication Currently reside nurse home skilled nursing facility
